subject: I have and issue with an order
description_text:
The order  #SSN5072 seems to be stuck in Feucht at the DHL deposit and I
cannot get in contact with them. My order has been sitting in there since
the 24th of December without any info about it. Are you able to check
anything about it? The tracking number is CE326636821DE if you need it.

conversations.body_text: Hi Cristy Ichim,    We apologize and will look into this for you as soon as possible.
Have you found anything about it?
Hi Cristy Ichim,    DHL is investigating the matter. We will notify you immediately upon receiving any updates!
